title: The Gamma Gals
description: RPG players by day, superheroes by night.THE GAMMA GALS is a creator-owned, 4-issue comic book series that features three RPG-loving teenage girls who awaken from a gamma-irradiated storm to discover they have extraordinary superpowers. Created, written, and illustrated by Stefano Terry and published by Fanbase Press, THE GAMMA GALS features a diverse cast of characters that aims to show all readers that everyone can be a superhero.
author: Stefano Terry
